page.title: 04MOSS VALLEY(I)
page.content:
{LOCAL HISTORY
This area was once extensively mined for both coal and iron ore,for use in the local iron works.The valley, up until the beginning of this cen_ tury was covered in coal tips and mine workings.When the industry ran down,these areas were left derelict.
{LANDSCAPE
Over the last decade,the area has been completely reclaimed.The old tips having been leveled,pools and ponds cleaned and created.Trees have also been planted and the old derel_ ict buildings levelled or made safe. the whole valley has been tured into a recreation park,part of which con_ tains a golf course.
